subtitle: A warming casserole using sweet potatoes, lean beef and vegetables

method.text: Heat the oil in a large stockpot. Add onion and garlic and fry for 2-3 min or until softened. Add the beef to the pot and fry for 5-10 min, stirring frequently until well browned.
Stir the flour into the pot and cook for 1 min. Gradually add stock, stirring constantly.
Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 1 hour, stirring frequently.
Add the potato, pepper, corn and bay leaves to the pot, cover and simmer for 30 min or until tender.
Season to taste. Garnish with fresh coriander and chilli seeds and serve immediately.

title: Creole-style beef casserole
